name: Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc.
description: Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc. is a leading global producer and distributor of fresh and fresh-cut fruit and vegetables. Founded in 1886, the company has a rich history and a strong commitment to sustainability and quality. Headquartered in Coral Gables, Florida, Fresh Del Monte operates in more than 100 countries and markets a wide range of products, including bananas, pineapples, melons, and avocados. The company is well-known for its dedication to responsible farming practices, ensuring that its products meet the highest standards of quality and safety. Fresh Del Monte also focuses on innovation, developing new products and packaging solutions to meet the evolving needs of consumers. With a diverse portfolio that includes both conventional and organic products, the company aims to promote healthy lifestyles and contribute to the well-being of communities globally. Fresh Del Monte is not only a key player in the fresh produce industry but also actively participates in environmental stewardship initiatives, striving to reduce its carbon footprint and enhance biodiversity. The company’s mission is to provide top-quality, nutritious products while ensuring sustainability for future generations.

key_executives.name: Hans S. H. F. van der Hoeven

seo.meta_title: Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc. | Quality Fresh Fruits and Vegetables
seo.meta_description: Explore Fresh Del Monte Produce Inc., a leader in fresh produce with a commitment to quality and sustainability. Discover our diverse product offerings and global reach.

faq.question: What does Fresh Del Monte Produce specialize in?
faq.answer: Fresh Del Monte specializes in the production and distribution of fresh and fresh-cut fruits and vegetables.

faq.question: Where is Fresh Del Monte headquartered?
faq.answer: Fresh Del Monte is headquartered in Coral Gables, Florida, USA.

faq.question: When was Fresh Del Monte founded?
faq.answer: Fresh Del Monte was founded in 1886.

faq.question: What are some of Fresh Del Monte's main products?
faq.answer: Some of the main products include bananas, pineapples, melons, and avocados.

faq.question: Is Fresh Del Monte involved in sustainability efforts?
faq.answer: Yes, Fresh Del Monte is committed to sustainable farming practices and reducing its environmental impact.
